Description: Hi. My son is 2 years old. Last week he fell ill for a day or two. He kept vomiting and had a day of diarree. However since last night he is couching constantly with plegm and runny nose, and loss of appetite. Do I need to test him for COVID-19?
DialogueText:
Patient:
Hi. My son is 2 years old. Last week he fell ill for a day or two. He kept vomiting and had a day of diarree. However since last night he is couching constantly with plegm and runny nose, and loss of appetite. Do I need to test him for COVID-19?
Doctor:
Maybe. Do video w/
